name: Smart Workflow
description: This connector brings AI directly into Axon Ivy, allowing developers to build, run, and improve AI agents within existing Axon Ivy processes.

descriptions.value: This connector brings AI directly into Axon Ivy, allowing developers to build, run, and improve AI agents within existing Axon Ivy processes.
Dieser Konnektor bringt KI direkt in Axon Ivy, sodass Entwickler KI-Agenten innerhalb bestehender Axon Ivy-Prozesse erstellen, ausführen und verbessern können.
